sentences.en: Allows to reorganize the order of the pages within the project.
sentences.cn: 允许重组秩序的网页内的项目.

sentences.en: At this time, it particularly states the NE how to reorganize and consolidate its core competence.
sentences.cn: 在此, 文章特别地阐述了民营企业应该怎样整合企业的核心能力.
你能把内容再组织一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fifth, must take the lead to reorganize carries out.
sentences.cn: 第五, 要带头整改落实.

sentences.en: He also began to reorganize federal agencies that were duplicating services.
sentences.cn: 他也开始重新组建那些提供相同服务的联邦机构.

sentences.en: He brought in Mckinsey & Company , the management - consultant people, to reorganize our top administration.
sentences.cn: 他把搞管理咨询的麦金西公司请来改组我们的高级管理机构.

sentences.en: He wanted to reorganize the dying Maxwell and Chalmers Motor Car Companies.
sentences.cn: 他想重新组织当时奄奄一息的马克斯韦尔及查默斯汽车公司.

sentences.en: I think it is grinded over, It'should be gave room for people to imagine and Reorganize.
sentences.cn: 我觉得磨得过分了, 应给后来的人想像和整理的空间.

sentences.en: It is the mother who is expected to reorganize her busy schedule.
sentences.cn: 应该让母亲来重新安排自己紧张的日程。

sentences.en: It's about time we started in to reorganize the department.
sentences.cn: 到了该改组这个部门的时候了.

sentences.en: NO. 18 Third, we need to reorganize care delivery around medical conditions.
sentences.cn: 第三, 我们需要根据医疗条件重组各地医疗供给.

sentences.en: Of course, some offices are no longer useful and we should reorganize them.
sentences.cn: 当然也有的原来的机构不能用,要抓紧调整.

sentences.en: Our office is being completely reorganized.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室正在彻底改组。

sentences.en: Reorganize and establishes more effective circuit resources relations network through circulates the platform.
sentences.cn: 通过流通平台,整合并建立更有效的通路资源关系网络.

sentences.en: The new manager was delegated to reorganize the department.
sentences.cn: 派这位新经理重新组织该部门.

sentences.en: With the company running on empty, the president decided to reorganize the management board.
sentences.cn: 由于公司亏损经营, 总裁决定重组管理层.

words.tran_cn: 重组（reorganize的过去分词）；整顿；重新制定

trans.tran_en: to arrange or organize something in a new way

trans.tran_cn: 改组，重新组织，改编，整编
